resources.string: You must type in a valid country code!
This app needs permission to process phone calls in order to work!

This app adds a country code to a dialed in number automatically. It will do it even when the app is not running. It should not do it if the number already has a country code, but if you see that it happens, set the country code in the app to an empty string.
\n\nThe app will perform some validation on your input, but it is not perfect and does not guarantee that what you type is a valid country code. Do not to type in + before the code, as it is added automatically.
